snippet: On Monday, G. Oliver Koppell will formally announce a bid for a different seat, challenging a fellow Democrat, Senator Jeffrey D. Klein, for Albany’s upper chamber.
abstract: Former New York State Assemblyman G Oliver Koppell is set to announce a challenge to fellow Democrat Sen Jeffrey D Klein for seat in Albany's upper chamber representing parts of the Bronx and Westchester County; says move is motivated by Klein's five-member breakaway group, Independent Democratic Conference, which agreed to share leadership with Republicans, move Koppell considers treachery.
lead_paragraph: On Monday, G. Oliver Koppell will formally announce a bid for a different seat, challenging a fellow Democrat, Senator Jeffrey D. Klein, for Albany’s upper chamber.

headline.main: Cooperation With G.O.P. Puts Senator in a Primary
headline.print_headline: Cooperation With G.O.P. Puts Senator in a Primary
